code: import rocketsLogo from'../media/images/rocketsLogo.png';export default function GetLastPlayData(data){var getImage=function getImage(){if(data.lpla.pid>=1){var playerImg="https://ak-static.cms.nba.com/wp-content/uploads/headshots/nba/latest/260x190/"+data.lpla.pid+".png";return playerImg;}else if(data.lpla.tid===data.hls.tid){var _playerImg="https://i.cdn.turner.com/nba/nba/assets/logos/teams/primary/web/"+data.hls.ta+".svg";return _playerImg;}else if(data.lpla.tid===data.vls.tid){var _playerImg2="https://i.cdn.turner.com/nba/nba/assets/logos/teams/primary/web/"+data.vls.ta+".svg";return _playerImg2;}else{var _playerImg3=rocketsLogo;return _playerImg3;}};var locX=data.lpla.locX/2;var locY=data.lpla.locY/2;var lastPlayData={'clock':data.lpla.cl,'teamID':data.lpla.tid,'playerID':data.lpla.pid,'playerImg':getImage(),'description':data.lpla.de,'locX':locX,'locY':locY,'opid':data.lpla.opid};return lastPlayData;}
